briefTitle: A Study to Evaluate the Efficacy and Safety of ABT-493/ABT-530 in Japanese Adults With Chronic Hepatitis C Virus Infection
officialTitle: A Randomized, Open-Label, Multicenter Study to Evaluate the Efficacy and Safety of ABT-493/ABT-530 in Japanese Adults With Chronic Hepatitis C Virus Infection (CERTAIN-1)
summary: The purpose of this phase 3, multicenter study is to evaluate the efficacy and safety of ABT-493/ABT-530 in Japanese adults with chronic Hepatitis C Virus (HCV)-infected, HCV direct-acting antiviral agent (DAA) treatment-na√Øve, and DAA treatment-experienced Japanese adult subjects.

primaryOutcome.measure: Percentage of Participants in Arms A and B With Sustained Virologic Response 12 Weeks Post-treatment (SVR12)
primaryOutcome.timeFrame: 12 weeks after the last actual dose of study drug
